safetyConsequences.P: All off-site electric transmission systems functioned as designed. An analysis of the response of plant equipment and protective systems concludes all safety related plant equipment and systems operated correctly for this condition. There were no safety system functional failures. There were no adverse effects on the health and safety of the public as a result of this event.
